meanings.definition: Enzymes that act within the cell.
meanings.sent1: The endoenzymes help with processes inside the cell.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study endoenzymes to understand cell functions better.
meanings.sent3: The endoenzymes in the cell were having a party, making everything work smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny cell workers, endoenzymes tirelessly perform their tasks.
meanings.sent5: The endoenzymes were like little cell magicians, creating magic within.

meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze reactions within the cell.
meanings.sent1: Within the cell, endoenzymes speed up chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: The endoenzymes play a crucial role in cell metabolism.
meanings.sent3: The endoenzymes in the cell were like chefs, cooking up reactions at lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: Endoenzymes are the conductors orchestrating the cellular symphony of reactions.
meanings.sent5: In the bustling cell, endoenzymes are the catalysts that keep things moving.
